title: Move your Facebook posts in just a few clicks

description.title: SocialMigrateAI
description.lead: SocialMigrateAI helps you keep your Facebook history without manually copying every single post.

how.title: How does SocialMigrateAI work?
how.caption: How to use the app
items: Sign in with Facebook using the secure login window.
Select the profile and date range from which you want to fetch posts.
Let the app load your posts and review them in a clear list.
Filter the results and choose the posts you want to keep.

strategy.title: Content migration strategy
strategy.intro: A few tips to make your export cleaner and easier:
strategy.caption: How to organise your export
items: Group posts by topic if you run several projects.
Split long time ranges into smaller chunks to browse results more easily.
Remove duplicates or low-value posts before exporting.
Prepare separate export files for different target systems (e.g. blog, CRM).

features.title: Key features of SocialMigrateAI
features.caption: What the app can do
features.p: SocialMigrateAI makes working with your Facebook data easier:
items: Secure login via Facebook Login - the app never sees your password.
Profile selection and flexible date filtering.
Convenient search and filtering of your posts list.
Export to JSON or CSV, plus easy copy & paste of content.
Runs entirely in your browser - no data stored on our servers.

data.title: Data storage
data.p1: SocialMigrateAI runs entirely in your browser and does not store any user data on our servers.
data.p2: If you want to remove the app's permissions to your Facebook data, you can do it in Facebook settings: Settings & Privacy → Settings → Apps and Websites → SocialMigrateAI → Remove.
data.p3: If you have additional questions regarding data, contact: contact@webaby.io
